title: OBEST RC Motorcycle, 2.4G Kids Remote Control Stunt Spinning Toy Car, 360° Rotating Air Gesture Off-Road High Speed Rotation Drift
features: WHEEL LIGHTS: The control range of 20 meters is stronger than that of ordinary remote control mini motorcycles.

STUNT MOTORCYCLE WITH COMPLETE FUNCTIONS: forward, reverse, turn left, turn right, the wheels can swing and rotate left and right, and run diagonally at 45°. The remote control motorcycle can also perform 360-degree rotation and drift operations.

SUFFICIENT POWER: stable rubber tire pressure and powerful motor can provide the car with better grip and better shock absorption performance. The widened tires provide excellent balance, making it easy for anyone to control off-road toy vehicles.

LARGE-CAPACITY BATTERY: The remote control motorcycle equipped with an upgraded battery can be used for about 15 minutes after being fully charged. The body lithium battery 3.7V500mAh+USB cable battery can be used for about 15 minutes after being fully charged

SAFE AND SECURE: This spinning stunt toy motorcycle has passed multiple safety certifications and is made of environmentally friendly materials, so you can use it with confidence. If you have any questions, you can contact us at any time, and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution as soon as possible.
